title: Additional scenes from A GENTLEMAN OF NERVE (1914) - Chaplin, Normand

sources.title: Additional scenes from A GENTLEMAN OF NERVE (1914) - Chaplin, Normand
sources.description: Additional scenes, some of which are sometimes left out in some releases, from a "A Gentleman of Nerve" (1914" with Charlie Chaplin and Mabel Normand. William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com Note. Although at present and due to some technical problem the Internet Archive video player is not working for this video, the download file is still good and plays normally.
